document.full_text: the senegalese government said on saturday it had thwarted a coup attempt by arresting suspected opposition-linked "commando" groups it said were planning lethal attacks around the capital.
document.title: senegal says thwarts coup bid before protest rally
lines_and_colors: the senegalese government said on saturday it had thwarted a coup attempt by arresting suspected opposition-linked "commando" groups it said were planning lethal attacks around the capital.
